ARABIC: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But then they turned away from him and said, 'He is an instructed madman!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they turned away from him, and said: "He is well-instructed, (but) possessed."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: yet they turned away from him and said: “This is a well-tutored madman.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and they turned away, saying, "He is a trained and insane person".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Whereas they had then turned away from him and said, “He is a madman, tutored!”?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then they had turned away from him and said: "(He is) one taught, a madman!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Yet they turned their backs on him and said: One taught (by others), a madman.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then they turned away from him and said, 'A man tutored, possessed!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they had turned away from him and said: One taught (by others), a madman?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then they turned away from him and said, "He is a madman, taught by others!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Yet they turned away from him and said: one tutored, one distraced.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: but they turned away from him, and said, ‘A tutored madman?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yet they turn away from him and say: "Tutored (by others), a man possessed!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then they had turned away from him (Messenger Muhammad SAW) and said: "One (Muhammad SAW) taught (by a human being), a madman!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but then they turned away from him, saying: 'He is tutored, mad'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But they turned away from him, and said, “Educated, but crazy!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:14] but they turned away from him and said, ‘He has been taught — that is, a human being is teaching him the Qur’ān — [he is] a madman!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And they had turned away from him) and they turned away from believing in him (and said: One taught (by others)) i.e. Muhammad is taught by Jabr and Yasar, (a madman) who is bewitched?
